00017 StationaryCF::StationaryCF(string name, double _lengthScale, double _variance)
00018 : CovarianceFunction(name, 2), lengthScale(parameters[0]), variance(parameters[1])
00019 {
00020     // Set parameter values
00021     variance = _variance;
00022     lengthScale = _lengthScale;
00023 
00024     // Parameter names
00025     parametersNames[0] = "length scale";
00026     parametersNames[1] = "variance";
00027 }

00046 double StationaryCF::computeElement(const vec& u, const vec& v) const
00047 {
00048     return computeElement( sqDist(u,v) );
00049 }

00059 double StationaryCF::computeDiagonalElement(const vec& u) const
00060 {
00061     return variance * correlation(0.0);
00062 }
00063 
00064 
00068 double StationaryCF::computeElement(double sqDist) const
00069 {
00070     return variance * correlation(sqDist);
00071 }

00080 void StationaryCF::covariance(mat& C, const mat& X) const
00081 {
00082     // Compute matrix of squared distances
00083     sqDistMatrix(C, X);
00084 
00085     // Apply correlation function
00086     applyCorrelation(C);
00087 
00088     // Finally, scale by process variance
00089     C *= variance;
00090 }
00091 
00092 
00102 void StationaryCF::covarianceGradient(mat& D, const int p, const mat& X) const
00103 {
00104     assert(p>=0 && p<numberParameters);
00105 
00106     // Compute matrix of squared distances
00107     sqDistMatrix(D, X);
00108 
00109     Transform* t = getTransform(p);
00110     double gradientTransform = t->gradientTransform(parameters[p]);
00111 
00112     switch (p)
00113     {
00114     case 0:
00115         applyCorrelationGradient(p, D);        // Compute gradient of correlation matrix
00116         D *= variance;                           // Multiply by variance
00117         break;
00118 
00119     case 1:
00120         applyCorrelation(D);
00121         break;
00122 
00123     }
00124 
00125     // Multiply by the gradient of the transform
00126     D *= gradientTransform;
00127 }
00128 
00129 
00136 void StationaryCF::applyCorrelation(mat& D) const
00137 {
00138     for(int i=0; i<D.rows(); i++) {
00139         for (int j=0; j<D.cols(); j++) {
00140             D(i,j) = correlation(D(i,j));
00141         }
00142     }
00143 }
00144 
00145 
00154 void StationaryCF::applyCorrelationGradient(int p, mat& D) const
00155 {
00156     for(int i=0; i<D.rows(); i++) {
00157         for (int j=0; j<D.cols(); j++) {
00158             D(i,j) = correlationGradient(p, D(i,j));
00159         }
00160     }
00161 }

00164 
00172 double StationaryCF::sqDist(vec u,vec v)
00173 {
00174     assert(length(u) == length(v));
00175 
00176     double d = 0.0;
00177     for (int i=0; i<length(u); i++) d += (u(i)-v(i))*(u(i)-v(i));
00178     return d;
00179 }
00180 
00181 
00188 void StationaryCF::sqDistMatrix(mat &D, const mat X)
00189 {
00190     D = zeros(X.rows(), X.rows());
00191 
00192     for (int i=0; i<X.rows(); i++) {
00193         for(int j=0; j<i; j++) {
00194             D(i,j) = sqDist(X.get_row(i), X.get_row(j));
00195             D(j,i) = D(i,j);
00196         }
00197     }
00198 }
